name: Hell: Retaliation
description:
Bullet-Hell but your only attack is parrying.

You are CONFINED in both playing space (borders) and your ability to attack (parry).

Our entry for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022.

CONTROLS

MOVE: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Stick / D-Pad
COLOR-CHANGE: C / Q / X / L1 / R1
PARRY: F / Z / Y / Sony Square, Xbox X, Nintendo Y
CROUCH: CTRL / SPACE / Sony Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B

mute: M

fullscreen: button on web and F11 on PC

GAMEPLAY
  • Parry the Bullet by pressing Parry while the bullet being in the white circle around you and you being in the same color. Those bullets will fly towards the enemy
  • Same color: Parry, different color: you take damage!
  • The red borders around the screen get smaller when you lose HP
  • To advance to the next stage, kill all enemies or wait ~60 seconds
    • The game has 5 stages
